headline: Anheuser-Busch InBev CEO: Bud Light sales are stable
summary: Anheuser-Busch InBev CEO Michel Doukeris says Bud Light is stable and the focus is now on zero-alcohol beers.

raw.headline: Anheuser-Busch InBev CEO: Bud Light sales are stable
raw.summary: Anheuser-Busch InBev CEO Michel Doukeris says Bud Light is stable and the focus is now on zero-alcohol beers.

headline: Keurig Dr Pepper taps new CMO to accelerate digital-first marketing
summary: Drew Panayiotou, most recently of Pfizer, is tasked with embracing new technology and keeping up momentum for brands like Dr Pepper.

raw.headline: Keurig Dr Pepper taps new CMO to accelerate digital-first marketing
raw.summary: Drew Panayiotou, most recently of Pfizer, is tasked with embracing new technology and keeping up momentum for brands like Dr Pepper.

headline: Keurig Dr Pepper Appoints Drew Panayiotou as Chief Marketing Officer, U.S. Refreshment Beverages; Company elevates digital-first capabilities as part of consumer-obsessed strategy
summary: BURLINGTON, Mass. and FRISCO, Texas- Keurig Dr Pepper announced the appointment of Drew Panayiotou as Chief Marketing Officer , U.S. Refreshment Beverages, effective today. Panayiotou brings a modern...
